movie_separation_summary: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision...
movie_the_prestige_summary: Rival 19th-century magicians engage in a bitter battle for trade secrets.
movie_one_flew_over_the_cuckoo's_nest: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
movie_one_flew_over_the_cuckoo's_nest_su: A newly admitted mental patient helps his docile companions defy the tyrannical head nurse.
movie_braveheart_summary: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.
movie_the_shawshank_redemption_summary: A banker, convicted of murdering his wife, forms a friendship with a fellow inmate over 25 years while trying to maintain his innocence.
movie_the_godfather_summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movie_the_dark_knight_summary: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.
movie_the_godfather_2_summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
movie_12_angry_man_summary: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
movie_the_return_of_the_king_summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
movie_schindler's_list_summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
movie_about_elly_summary: The mysterious disappearance of a kindergarten teacher during a picnic in the north of Iran is followed by a series of misadventures for her fellow travelers.
movie_leilas_brothers_summary: Leila has been supporting her parents and four brothers for years. As her brothers are trying to make their own way and tackle their own problems, family conflicts arise.
movie_the_frog_summary: Ramin plans a robbery on his childhood classmate Noori who has become a mysterious rich man and that's just a beginning of a brutal journey.
movie_mortal_wound_summary: Story of drama, love, and crime among relatives all connected through a huge holding company.
movie_law_of_tehran_summary: The police are after a drug lord named Naser Khakzad, but when they finally manage to catch him, he tries whatever he can think of to escape and save his family.
movie_emperors_new_groove_summary: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne and his human form with the help of Pacha, a gentle llama herder.
movie_star_wars_clone_wars_summary: Jedi Knights lead the Grand Army of the Republic against the droid army of the Separatists.
movie_shrek_summary: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.
movie_finding_nemo_summary: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
movie_ratatouille_summary: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.
comment_hossein_mahboubi: One of the best that you can ever see
